trans-unit.source: When you install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server, you automatically start with a 30-day evaluation license. To configure <MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, you must request a permanent standard license file from Atempo.

seg-source.mrk: When you install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server, you automatically start with a 30-day evaluation license.
To configure <MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, you must request a permanent standard license file from Atempo.

target.mrk: Lorsque vous installez le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, vous commencez automatiquement à utiliser une licence d'évaluation de 30 jours.
Pour configurer l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, vous devez demander à Atempo un fichier de licence standard permanent.

trans-unit.source: The Lina server regularly counts the number of used licenses. However, the Lina server does not prohibit the declaration of new agents when the number of available licenses is reached.

seg-source.mrk: The Lina server regularly counts the number of used licenses.
However, the Lina server does not prohibit the declaration of new agents when the number of available licenses is reached.

target.mrk: Le serveur Lina effectue régulièrement le calcul des licences utilisées.
Cependant, le serveur Lina n'interdit pas la déclaration de nouveaux agents au-delà du nombre de licences disponibles.

trans-unit.source: When the number of active agents is higher than the number of authorized licenses, the Lina server places additional agents in the list of blocked agents (missing license alarm in the Agents view). These agents cannot be backed up, but they remain restorable.

seg-source.mrk: When the number of active agents is higher than the number of authorized licenses, the Lina server places additional agents in the list of blocked agents (missing license alarm in the Agents view).
These agents cannot be backed up, but they remain restorable.

target.mrk: Quand le nombre d'agents actifs est supérieur au nombre de licences autorisées, le serveur Lina place les agents supplémentaires dans la liste d'agents bloqués (alarme « licence manquante » dans la vue Agents).
Ces agents ne peuvent pas être sauvegardés, mais il sont restaurables.

trans-unit.source: In the Notifications view, several alarms are issued before all licenses are used. In the meantime, the administrator can buy new licenses, delete agents, or place them in archived or disabled mode. You can also monitor the license status, using the License tile In the dashboard of the Lina Administration Console. Disabled agents can be tracked in the agent list, using the block status column.

seg-source.mrk: In the Notifications view, several alarms are issued before all licenses are used.
In the meantime, the administrator can buy new licenses, delete agents, or place them in archived or disabled mode.
You can also monitor the license status, using the License tile In the dashboard of the Lina Administration Console.
Disabled agents can be tracked in the agent list, using the block status column.

target.mrk: Dans la vue Notifications, plusieurs alarmes sont émises avant que toutes les licences soient utilisées.
Entre-temps, l'administrateur peut acheter de nouvelles licences, supprimer des agents ou les mettre en mode archivé ou désactivé.
Vous pouvez également surveiller l'état de la licence à l'aide de la tuile Licence dans le tableau de bord de la console d'administration Lina.
Les agents désactivés peuvent être repérés dans la liste des agents à l'aide d'une icône particulière.
